CustomField.formula: IF ( INCLUDES ( Marca__c , "KIA" ), "KIA; ", null) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Marca__c , "TOYOTA" ), "TOYOTA; ", null) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Marca__c , "HINO" ), "HINO; ", null) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Marca__c , "SUZUKI" ), "SUZUKI; ", null) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Marca__c , "JMC" ), "JMC; ", null) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Marca__c , "HERO" ), "HERO; ", null) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Marca__c , "YAMAHA" ), "YAMAHA; ", null) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Marca__c , "HAOJUE" ), "HAOJUE; ", null) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Marca__c , "GENESIS" ), "GENESIS; ", null)
